MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA1 postcode area of Craigie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2pm to repair an overhead line fault located near to Camsiscan Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.32pm on Tuesday 27th October 2020.
